TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCellColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图例中的单元列，用于扩展默认图例的功能。

span.span: Represents a cell column in a legend, which is used to extend the functionality of the default legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以按任意顺序，这将使您能够灵活地扩展默认图例项的功能放置任意数量的单元格的列。Any number of cell columns can be placed in any order, which gives you the flexibility to extend the abilities of the default legend entries. 图例单元格列才适用于从序列或数据点自动生成的项。The legend cell columns are only applicable to items that are automatically generated from series or data points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代图例单元列属于将图例的属性。This property overrides the property of the legend that the legend cell column belongs to. 它还将重写将图例的属性。It also overrides the property of the legend.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元列的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the legend cell column type.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示图例单元列的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the legend cell column type.

value.span: 此值表示将用于定义图例单元列内容的类型。

span.span: This value represents the type that will be used to define the legend cell column contents.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定将显示在每个单个图例单元列的内容的类型。This property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell column. 有两个可能值：There are two possible values: - 文本： 默认情况下，#LEGENDTEXT 关键字用来放置每个单元格列中的值。Text: By default, the #LEGENDTEXT keyword is used to place the value in each cell column. 但是，你可以使用属性来设置相应的序列的值将替换为任何关键字。However, you can use the property to set any keyword(s) that will be replaced by a value of the corresponding series. - SeriesSymbol： 图例单元格将包含一个序列符号，如矩形、 行、 与标记或标记，其相应序列与相同的填充颜色的行。SeriesSymbol: The legend cell will contain a series symbol, such as a rectangle, line, line with marker, or marker, of the same fill color as its corresponding series.

summary.span: 获取或设置图例列文本的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font for the legend column text.

value.span: 一个 对象，该值指示图例列文本的字体。

span.span: A object that specifies the font for the legend column text.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才适用设置为，和一个`string`值定义为属性。This property is only applicable when the is set to , and a `string` value is defined for the property. 你可以使用属性来设置图例单元列的字体属性。You can use the property to set font properties of the legend cell column. 如果你尝试更改此属性对象在运行时，将产生编译错误。If you attempt to change the properties of this object at run time, a compilation error will occur. 若要在运行时设置字体属性，你必须创建一个新对象。To set font properties at run time, you must create a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性被以图例字号的百分比。This property is measured as a percentage of the legend font size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列符号大小被以图例字号的百分比。The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size. 此属性才适用如果属性设置为。This property is only applicable if the property is set to .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.KeywordsStringEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例单元列的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell column.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例单元列的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell column.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ToolTip`属性设置为图例项和图例单元格，则图例单元属性的优先级。If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence. 此属性可以设置要显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据的特殊关键字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
